modName: Become a Werewolf at the start
summary: Places a totem a rock outside the starter quest cave that makes you a werewolf.
descriptionHtml:
NOTICE: I currently do not own Dawnguard as I have no money and am busy trying to rectify that (jobhunting, etc). Untill I do this mod will remain untested with dawnguard and potentially incompatible, and I won\'t be visiting nexus very often so I may not respond to messages in a timely manner.

[size=1]Many thanks to those who have endorsed my work, I appreciate the recognition.[/size]

===What the Mod Does===

Places a totem outside the starting cave that turns you into a werewolf, or if you have been a werewolf already and got cured, turns you back into a werewolf.

Version 1.1 fixes bug where your first transformation never worked.

===My Other Mods===

Become a Vampire - Anytime: http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/downloads/file.php?id=11965
Sustained Spells: http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/downloads/file.php?id=13450
Everyone Get Inside! Dragon Attack: http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/downloads/file.php?id=12785
Werepyres: http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/downloads/file.php?id=11503
Werewolf Second howl Toggle: http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/downloads/file.php?id=12017
author: MGoods
